meanings.definition: Items that can be returned for a refund or exchange.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to collect all the returnables from my online orders.
meanings.sent2: The store has a special section for returnables near the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The returnables piled up in the corner made the room look cluttered.
meanings.sent4: Her collection of returnables was like a treasure trove waiting to be exchanged.
meanings.sent5: Returning the returnables was a simple way to get some money back.

meanings.sent1: The store only accepts returnables with the original packaging.
meanings.sent2: The returnables policy allows customers to bring back unwanted items.
meanings.sent3: His returnables attitude made it easy for him to shop without worry.
meanings.sent4: The suitcase was definitely a returnables item with its tags still attached.
meanings.sent5: She found the returnables process hassle-free and convenient.

meanings.definition: A container or packaging that can be returned for reuse or recycling.
meanings.sent1: The returnables bin was overflowing with plastic bottles and cans.
meanings.sent2: The company promotes the use of returnables to reduce waste.
meanings.sent3: The returnables box had a sign saying 'Help the environment, return here.'
meanings.sent4: The returnables container was like a green initiative in action.
meanings.sent5: Recycling returnables is an easy way to contribute to sustainability.
